summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Plat 37E, page 105 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property on both sides of East Madison Street between 27th Avenue East and 28th Avenue East from Multiple Residence/Low Density (RM 800) to Neighborhood Business (BN), and rezone property abutting north thereof on 28th Avenue from Single Family Residence Hight Density (SF 5000) to Neighborhood Business (BN) Zone. (Petition of Charles Bergmann, et al.; C.F. No. 293056.)
